sentences.en: "Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo," said Grace.
sentences.cn: “利奥，我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。

sentences.en: Every visitor to Georgia is overwhelmed by the kindness, charm and hospitality of the people.
sentences.cn: 来到佐治亚州的每位游客都被当地人的善良、可爱和热情好客所深深打动。

sentences.en: He struck the ball straight into the hospitality tents.
sentences.cn: 他将球直接打进迎宾帐篷里。

sentences.en: He welcomed you to enjoy his hospitality.
His hospitality was instantaneous and all-embracing.
sentences.cn: 无论何时无论对谁他都是很好客的。

sentences.en: I don't want to trespass on your hospitality.
I received the hospitality of the family.
sentences.cn: 我受到这家人亲切的款待.

sentences.en: I'll not abuse your hospitality, your kindness.
sentences.cn: 我不会辜负你的热情招待和好意.

sentences.en: Thank you for your kind hospitality.
Thank you for your kind hospitality.
Thanks for your hospitality over the past few weeks.
sentences.cn: 感谢你几周来的热情款待。

sentences.en: The natives are noted for their hospitality.
sentences.cn: 当地人以殷勤好客而闻名.

sentences.en: The response of the audience varied from outright rejection to warm hospitality.
sentences.cn: 观众反应不一，有人完全不能接受，也有人击掌叫好。

sentences.en: You eat her food, enjoy her hospitality and then criticize her behind her back.
sentences.cn: 你吃着她的食物，享受着她的款待，然后还在背地里指责她。

trans.tran_cn: 殷勤好客，招待，款待，（气候，环境等的）宜人，适宜
